nodes.text: Pandor's Hydrospanner was a repair and provision facility located in the Ord Mynock Freeport. It was part of the chain of Pandor's Hydrospanners that stretched across the galaxy. The store was run by a modified 3PO-series protocol droid called D-3P8 and carried a wide selection of goods, including weapons, survival gear and mining equipment.

Pandor's Hydrospanner also dealt in vehicles. It leased several docking bays that held its selection of light freighters and snubfighters. In addition, Pandor's would sell and install upgrades for their customers' vehicles. However, they strictly followed Imperial laws and would report any illegal modifications.
